comments:
Build ID: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
1. start Eclipse with a german locale (add -Duser.language=de -Duser.country=DE on separate lines to eclipse.ini after -vmargs)

2. open a Jira repository bug (double click in task list)
3. find an entry in the error log: "Error while parsing date field"


More information:
Mylar Version used is 2.0.0.v20070302-2000

This problem does not occur when setting -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=US in eclipse.ini.

Stacktrace:

This is from the open action item from bug 174245: Non thread safe use of the DateFormat. 
We need to add locale to all of those, but it is good that we now have real use case for this.
The dates should not be stored in a local specific manner. For Trac dates are serialized as seconds (since 1970).
Now all formatters/parsers are using explicit locale. Please try with next release (or dev build) and reopen if this issue still appears. Thanks.
